name: Shroom & Gloom Doom
description:
You are a lonely mushroom pod seeking escape from the Shelf-ish Forest. Collect Beans to Embiggen and make your escape! However, there are anti-beans you may need along the way to De-biggen and find you way to the exit!

This game was made for Mottzy's Jammy Jam! Check it out and provide feedback as desired. Or don't!

Controls:

  • Mouse
    • Left Click to move
    • Right-drag to rotate view
    • Middle Scroll to zoom in and ou
  • Keyboard
    • Arrow keys to move

Credits

  • Mottzy Makes (me!) 'cause I made it all
  • Justin Arnold - Creator of RPG In A Box (engine for the game)
  • Justin Penn-Pierson - Music!
